# Setting Graph Size
```{r, message=FALSE, width=500, height=500}


library(plotly)
m = list(
  l = 50,
  r = 50,
  b = 100,
  t = 100,
  pad = 4
)
plot_ly(x = seq(0, 8), y = seq(0, 8)) %>%
  layout(autosize = F, width = 500, height = 500, margin = m)


```
